text:
Does a local host development work already?
I have a problem with JSONs files from my production account. If I try to serve it locally, I see not-rendered HTML (as if the Hubl processor doesn't works).
When I try to upload these to next-to-production test account - I have problem with JSONs files upload (same issue with CLI and FTP).
I think here is a key - maybe generated modules with JSON files are dependent to the mother-account, where they are generated was.

Do you know another way to making a changes of production pages not on the production (only for tests pourposes)?
I was out for a month and I see now that the live preview updates with the watch :partyparrot: Thank you!!!!
on this -- just want to confirm that that sync is only to be occurring on the resave of a .html template file, not with module changes?
Yeah, finally getting settled in over here with my office up and running

<@U6W3H6YN8> it looks like that was the issue — you can’t watch the same directory that the .yml is in. we work with so many files, and the portals came to us fairly disorganized, that it’s not worth it to fetch everything separately at this point — so i’ve put the entire DM into a folder next to the .yml, and watch works now.

hi, i’m up and running, but getting some errors. haven’t found solutions on the web yet, can someone point me toward documentation or threads?
1. npx hs upload: “[ERROR] The request failed because “/Global content/Global Groups/Vast Theme/Vast Full Width Blog Subscription Module.template.json” was not found in portal [portalnumber redacted]” 
2. later in the upload listing, i get this: 
[ERROR] Uploading file “/Users/dreigenannt/Amorphous/Fahlgren/GitRepo/lubrizol-lfp/design_mgr/Global content/Global Groups/Vast Theme/Vast Full Width Blog Subscription Module.template.json” to “/Global content/Global Groups/Vast Theme/Vast Full Width Blog Subscription Module.template.json” failed
[ERROR] Unable to parse DnD template: Cannot construct instance of `com.HubSpot.content.filemapper.core.dndtemplates.DndTemplate`, problem: Cannot build DndTemplate, some of required attributes are not set [layoutData]

other .json files are fetched normally. this is happening with some files in Global Groups and Marketplace.
are these old-style modules or something? or is this just that modules don’t work with local and i need to fetch/upload every other directory separately, ignoring this one? files in this portal are all over the place and watching one directory is kind of a joke
